sentences.en: A small group of neo-Nazis have infiltrated the ranks. We must weed them out as soon as possible.
sentences.cn: 队伍中混入了一小撮新纳粹分子，我们必须尽快将其清除。
卡斯帕正在给花园除草。

sentences.en: First thing tomorrow I'll weed the garden.
sentences.cn: 我明天一大早首先去除园内的杂草.

sentences.en: He is keen to weed out the many applicants he believes may be frauds.
sentences.cn: 他急于剔除那些他认为是冒牌货的申请人。

sentences.en: He saw the phosphorescence of the Gulf weed in the water.
sentences.cn: 他看见马尾藻在水中发出的磷光.

sentences.en: His pond has been choked by the fast-growing weed.
sentences.cn: 他的池塘里长满了恣意蔓生的杂草。

sentences.en: I wish I could give up the weed , ie stop smoking.
I've been weeding the flower beds.
sentences.cn: 我一直在除花坛里的杂草。

sentences.en: Inside was peacock water, rocks and weed'showing as in an aquarium.
sentences.cn: 礁石内侧:海水绚烂, 暗礁林立,海藻丛生,就象水族馆的生态展览一样.

sentences.en: Isn't it absurd to plant crops and not weed the fields?
sentences.cn: 种庄稼不除草不是见鬼 么 ?

sentences.en: Large, clogging banks of weed are the only problem.
sentences.cn: 唯一的问题就是大量水草阻塞了水道。

sentences.en: Other benefits such as dole money could be frozen and there will be a huge push to weed out fiddlers.
sentences.cn: 其他像失业救济金这样的补贴可能会被冻结，大家会努力把骗子清除掉。

sentences.en: Please help me weed the garden.
Scoop the blanket weed out and use it to line hanging baskets.
sentences.cn: 把那些丝状水藻捞出来，垫在吊篮里。

sentences.en: The gardener estimated that it would take him four hours to weed the garden.
sentences.cn: 园丁估计他给花园除草需要四个小时.

sentences.en: Tomorrow I have to weed the garden.
You pull my hair as if you were plucking up a weed.
sentences.cn: 你拉我的头发就象是在拔杂草.

words.tran_cn: 瘦弱的；似杂草的；尽是杂草的

phrases.tran_cn: 除草；杂草防除；野草控制

trans.tran_en: a wild plant growing where it is not wanted that prevents crops or garden flowers from growing properly
to remove unwanted plants from a garden or other place
to remove unwanted plants from a garden or other place
